content:
During the last day, on March 26, Russian troops fired the territory of 90 settlements in nine regions of Ukraine.

About thisinformsMilitary Media Center.

"In general, from different types of weapons - mortars, tanks, artillery, RSSV, SDR, OTRC, UAV and tactical aviation - were attacked 90 settlements and 61 infrastructure objects," the statement reads.

As a result of a hostile attack, they are killed and injured among civilians, the number of victims is clarified.

As reported by the Armyinform, RosarmiaShe was firedKrasnopil and Znob-Novgorod communities of Sumy region.

We will remind, the enemy per day made 386 beats in the Zaporozhye region,There is destructionHousing and infrastructure.
title: During the day, the Russians attacked 90 settlements of Ukraine
